details.name: Hạ Long Bay
descriptions: Hạ Long Bay is known for its emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped with rainforests.
Visitors can enjoy boat trips, kayaking, and exploring the beautiful caves and grottoes of the bay.
The bay is home to a diverse range of marine life and is a popular destination for nature lovers.
details.highlight: One of the New7Wonders of Nature, Hạ Long Bay offers breathtaking natural beauty and rich biodiversity.

details.name: Angkor Wat
descriptions: Angkor Wat is a stunning temple complex with intricate carvings and architecture dating back to the 12th century.
Visitors can explore the ancient ruins, temples, and monuments spread across the vast archaeological site.
The site is known for its spiritual and historical significance.
details.highlight: Angkor Wat is a symbol of Cambodia and an important religious site for Buddhists.

details.name: Machu Picchu
descriptions: Machu Picchu is a well-preserved Inca citadel that offers stunning panoramic views of the surrounding mountains.
Visitors can hike the Inca Trail to reach the site or take a train to the nearby town of Aguas Calientes.
The site is a testament to the advanced engineering and architectural skills of the Inca civilization.
details.highlight: Machu Picchu is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the most iconic archaeological sites in the world.
